mean_cn: v. 给…上颈手枷，使…惹人嘲笑；  n. 示众，颈手枷，使惹人嘲笑
mean_en: a device that was used in the past for punishing someone in public and that consists of a wooden frame with holes in which the head and hands can be locked
short_phrase: pillory the man for his crimes
sentence: The whole crowd pillories the man for his crimes.
